body.p:
The STS will safely withstand without mis-operation or damage:
Transient voltage surges on either AC power input as defined by ANSI/IEEE C62.41 for Category B3 locations (high surge exposure industrial and commercial facilities)
Electrostatic discharges (ESD) up to 10 kV at any point on the exterior of the unit
Electromagnetic fields from portable transmitters within 3 feet (1 meter) of the unitGrounding for the WaveStar Static Transfer Switch must comply with local building codes and National Electric Codes.
